title: Chicken Divan Soup
directions: Melt butter in Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Add onion and sauté 5 to 6 minutes or until tender.
Add garlic and red pepper, cook 2 minutes.
Blend in parts, cooling mixture with broth and cream cheese.
Add chicken and shredded cheddar cheese.
Cook, stirring occasionally 5 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. (It doesn’t usually need any.) Serve with almonds, if desired.
ingredients: ¾ tsp dried crushed red pepper
48 oz chicken broth (3 cans or 1 box)
1- 8 oz pkg cream cheese, cut into cubes
